description: A simple but finely crafted shortsword.
Includes lockpicks, small file, and a mirror mounted on a metal handle.
A sturdy backpack to carry equipment and supplies.
A heavy iron bar, usually used for prying.
Includes dark clothing, a hood, and gloves for stealthy operations.
Neutralizes poison when applied to a creature.
Allows climbing or securing a rope to an object.
For writing and copying maps or documents.
A small mirror mounted on a folding metal frame.
A small book with coded messages and secret signs used by rogues.
